#print Asymptotics.IsBigO.trans_tendsto_norm_atTop /-
theorem Asymptotics.IsBigO.trans_tendsto_norm_atTop {Œ± : Type _} {u v : Œ± ‚Üí ùïú} {l : Filter Œ±}
    (huv : ¬´expr =O[ ] ¬ª u l v) (hu : Tendsto (fun x => ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (u x)) l atTop) :
    Tendsto (fun x => ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (v x)) l atTop :=
  by
  rcases huv.exists_pos with ‚ü®c, hc, hcuv‚ü©
  rw [is_O_with] at hcuv
  convert tendsto.at_top_div_const hc (tendsto_at_top_mono' l hcuv hu)
  ext x
  rw [mul_div_cancel_left _ hc.ne.symm]
#align asymptotics.is_O.trans_tendsto_norm_at_top Asymptotics.IsBigO.trans_tendsto_norm_atTop
-/
tendsto_zpow_atTop_atTop:
#print tendsto_zpow_atTop_atTop /-
theorem tendsto_zpow_atTop_atTop {n : ‚Ñ§} (hn : 0 < n) : Tendsto (fun x : ùïú => x ^ n) atTop atTop :=
  by
  lift n to ‚Ñï using hn.le
  simp only [zpow_ofNat]
  exact tendsto_pow_at_top (nat.cast_pos.mp hn).ne'
#align tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top tendsto_zpow_atTop_atTop

#print Asymptotics.IsLittleO.sum_range /-
theorem Asymptotics.IsLittleO.sum_range {Œ± : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup Œ±] {f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí Œ±} {g : ‚Ñï ‚Üí expr‚Ñù}
    (h : ¬´expr =o[ ] ¬ª f atTop g) (hg : 0 ‚â§ g)
    (h'g :
      Tendsto
        (fun n =>
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (g i))
        atTop atTop) :
    ¬´expr =o[ ] ¬ª
      (fun n =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (f i))
      atTop fun n =>
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (g i) :=
  by
  have A : ‚àÄ i, ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (g i) = g i := fun i => Real.norm_of_nonneg (hg i)
  have B :
    ‚àÄ n,
      ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (g i)) =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
          (g i) :=
    fun n => by rwa [Real.norm_eq_abs, abs_sum_of_nonneg']
  apply is_o_iff.2 fun Œµ Œµpos => _
  obtain ‚ü®N, hN‚ü© : ‚àÉ N : ‚Ñï, ‚àÄ b : ‚Ñï, N ‚â§ b ‚Üí ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (f b) ‚â§ Œµ / 2 * g b := by
    simpa only [A, eventually_at_top] using is_o_iff.mp h (half_pos Œµpos)
  have :
    ¬´expr =o[ ] ¬ª
      (fun n : ‚Ñï =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N) (f i))
      at_top fun n : ‚Ñï =>
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (g i) :=
    by
    apply is_o_const_left.2
    exact or.inr (h'g.congr fun n => (B n).symm)
  filter_upwards [is_o_iff.1 this (half_pos Œµpos), Ici_mem_at_top N]with n hn Nn
  calc
    ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (f i)) =
        ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i) +
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
              (f i)) :=
      by rw [sum_range_add_sum_Ico _ Nn]
    _ ‚â§
        ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
              (f i)) :=
      (norm_add_le _ _)
    _ ‚â§
        ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
            (Œµ / 2 * g i) :=
      (add_le_add le_rfl (norm_sum_le_of_le _ fun i hi => hN _ (mem_Ico.1 hi).1))
    _ ‚â§
        ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (Œµ / 2 * g i) :=
      by
      refine' add_le_add le_rfl _
      apply sum_le_sum_of_subset_of_nonneg
      ¬∑ rw [range_eq_Ico]
        exact Ico_subset_Ico (zero_le _) le_rfl
      ¬∑ intro i hi hident
        exact mul_nonneg (half_pos Œµpos).le (hg i)
    _ ‚â§
        Œµ / 2 *
            ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
              (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
                (g i)) +
          Œµ / 2 *
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
              (g i) :=
      by
      rw [‚Üê mul_sum]
      exact add_le_add hn (mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left le_rfl (half_pos Œµpos).le)
    _ =
        Œµ *
          ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
              (g i)) :=
      by
      simp [B]
      ring
    
#align asymptotics.is_o.sum_range Asymptotics.IsLittleO.sum_range
-/

/-- If `f : ùïú ‚Üí E` is bounded in a punctured neighborhood of `a`, then `f(x) = o((x - a)‚Åª¬π)` as
`x ‚Üí a`, `x ‚â† a`. -/
theorem Filter.IsBoundedUnder.isLittleO_sub_self_inv {ùïú E : Type _} [NormedField ùïú] [Norm E] {a : ùïú} {f : ùïú ‚Üí E}
    (h : IsBoundedUnder (¬∑ ‚â§ ¬∑) (nhds_within.ne a) (norm ‚àò f)) :
    ¬´expr =o[ ] ¬ª f (nhds_within.ne a) fun x => (x - a)‚Åª¬π :=
  by
  refine' (h.is_O_const (one_ne_zero' (expr‚Ñù))).trans_is_o (is_o_const_left.2 <| or.inr _)
  simp only [(¬∑ ‚àò ¬∑), norm_inv]
  exact (tendsto_norm_sub_self_punctured_nhds a).inv_tendsto_zero
#align filter.is_bounded_under.is_o_sub_self_inv Filter.IsBoundedUnder.isLittleO_sub_self_inv
-/

theorem Asymptotics.isLittleO_pow_pow_atTop_of_lt [OrderTopology ùïú] {p q : ‚Ñï} (hpq : p < q) :
    ¬´expr =o[ ] ¬ª (fun x : ùïú => x ^ p) atTop fun x => x ^ q :=
  by
  refine' (is_o_iff_tendsto' _).mpr (tendsto_pow_div_pow_atTop_zero hpq)
  exact (eventually_gt_at_top 0).mono fun x hx hxq => (pow_ne_zero q hx.ne' hxq).elim
#align asymptotics.is_o_pow_pow_at_top_of_lt Asymptotics.isLittleO_pow_pow_atTop_of_lt

#print Filter.Tendsto.cesaro_smul /-
/-- The Cesaro average of a converging sequence converges to the same limit. -/
theorem Filter.Tendsto.cesaro_smul {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace (expr‚Ñù) E] {u : ‚Ñï ‚Üí E} {l : E}
    (h : Tendsto u atTop ((nhds) l)) :
    Tendsto
      (fun n : ‚Ñï =>
        ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (n‚Åª¬π : expr‚Ñù)
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (u i)))
      atTop ((nhds) l) :=
  by
  rw [‚Üê tendsto_sub_nhds_zero_iff, ‚Üê is_o_one_iff (expr‚Ñù)]
  have := Asymptotics.isLittleO_sum_range_of_tendsto_zero (tendsto_sub_nhds_zero_iff.2 h)
  apply ((is_O_refl (fun n : ‚Ñï => (n : expr‚Ñù)‚Åª¬π) at_top).smul_is_o this).congr' _ _
  ¬∑ filter_upwards [Ici_mem_at_top 1]with n npos
    have npos‚Ñù : (0 : expr‚Ñù) < n := Nat.cast_pos.2 npos
    simp only [smul_sub, sum_sub_distrib, sum_const, card_range, sub_right_inj]
    rw [nsmul_eq_smul_cast (expr‚Ñù), smul_smul, inv_mul_cancel npos‚Ñù.ne', one_smul]
  ¬∑ filter_upwards [Ici_mem_at_top 1]with n npos
    have npos‚Ñù : (0 : expr‚Ñù) < n := Nat.cast_pos.2 npos
    rw [Algebra.id.smul_eq_mul, inv_mul_cancel npos‚Ñù.ne']
#align filter.tendsto.cesaro_smul Filter.Tendsto.cesaro_smul

#print Filter.Tendsto.cesaro /-
/-- The Cesaro average of a converging sequence converges to the same limit. -/
